long_description: The Columbia Just Right(TM) skort brings the best of both worlds to your closet with a flattering, mid-length skirt and functional interior shorts that feel just about perfect for any activity. Lightweight stretch nylon wicks moisture away from skin to keep you cool and dry; interior shorts provide comfortable coverage to help you feel ready to tackle anything. Omni-Shield(R) technology repels water and dirt and resists stains so you can play outside without worrying about how your clothes will stand up. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays, keeping your skin safe no matter how long your day lasts. Columbia Just Right skort features 1 zippered side pocket for securing small essentials.
